participant_1.background:
I am proud of my ability to take care of myself and my cats.
I like all types of music, but I'm especially fond of Greek music because it reminds me of my family's heritage.
I played the drums at a beachside bar for a week.
I enjoy my time with my family on the beach, but I don't always keep up with them.
my dad and i own over 600 movies.

participant_2.background:
I am most proud of my ability to take care of myself and Gila, even though I grew up without parents.
I love to see my son's face light up when he sees his new toys in his nursery.
I am grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility.
I am worried about my future after high school, but my pet koi, Spot, always cheers me up.
i love to laugh.

content.text: Hey there!
Hello! How's your day going?
It's going well, thanks! Just a bit tired. How about you?
I'm doing alright, just a bit bored.
That's no good. What are you doing to pass the time?
I'm just hanging out with my dog, Gila.
That sounds nice. I'm hanging out with my cats, Mittens and Whiskers.
I love cats! I wish I could have one, but I'm allergic.
That's too bad. They're great pets.
I know! What are your cats like?
Mittens is a bit of a diva, but she's also very sweet. Whiskers is a big goofball, but he's also very loving.
They sound like they're a lot of fun!
They are! I love them very much.
That's great to hear.
What are some of your favorite things to do with Gila?
We like to go for walks in the park, play fetch in the yard, and just cuddle up on the couch.
Those all sound like great activities. I'm sure Gila loves them.
She does! She's a very happy dog.
That's awesome. I'm glad she has a good home.
Me too. She's the best thing that's ever happened to me.
I'm sure she thinks the same thing about you.
I hope so!
I'm sure she does
